placement: Place according to campaign layout requirements
context: Use in context of: Весна в Греции ждет вас!. Ensure asset aligns with brand guidelines and campaign messaging.
responsiveBehavior: Scale proportionally for mobile devices. Ensure minimum readable size on small screens.
emailClientNotes: Large file size may affect loading in some email clients
accessibilityRequirements: Ensure alt text is provided: "AI-selected These seasonal images will highlight the beauty of spring in Greece, featuring spring flowers, sunny beaches, and local cuisine, enhancing the overall campaign theme.". Alt text should be descriptive and convey the image's purpose in the email context.
fallbackStrategy: If image fails to load, display alt text with appropriate background color
